---
name: Task Update
about: Update status or percent for a task
title: "Task Update: <task-id> short-summary"
labels: [task-update]
---

Paste JSON and edit:

```json
{
  "taskId": "D1-T1",
  "status": "In progress",
  "percent": 50,
  "note": "what changed",
  "owner": "@your-github-username"
}
```
